submission:
class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        p = 0
        pow2 = 1
        maxStep = 1
        downSteps = 1
        ans = 0
        
        while maxStep - downSteps <= k:
            minStep = maxStep - downSteps
            
            if minStep <= k and maxStep >= k:
                actualDown = maxStep - k
                ans += math.comb(downSteps, actualDown)
            
            maxStep += pow2
            p += 1
            pow2 *= 2
            downSteps += 1
            
        return ans
